snippet: Don Garber has diversified Major League Soccer’s ownership, overhauled its finances and built a foundation that has made the league an established player in the North American sports landscape.
abstract: Don Garber has diversified Major League Soccer’s ownership, overhauled its finances and built a foundation that has made the league an established player in the North American sports landscape.

headline.main: M.L.S. Preview: Five Questions for Commissioner Don Garber
